item.title: Download HashMyFiles 2.50
item.description: HashMyFiles is a small utility that allows you to calculate the MD5 and SHA1 hashes of one or more files in your system. You can easily copy the list of MD5/SHA1 hashes to the clipboard or save them to a text/html/xml file. HashMyFiles can also be launched from the Windows Explorer context menu and displays the MD5/SHA1 hashes of the selected file or folder.
